open.title: Outage | Western and Eastern Cape
open.description: We are investigating reports of no connectivity for clients on various fibre networks in Western and Eastern Cape. Afrihost Network Engineers are working on resolving the issues as soon as possible. We sincerely apologise for any inconvenience caused.

updates.content: Afrihost engineers have applied a fix to mitigate the impact.

open.title: Vumatel outage | Lone Hill
open.description: Vumatel has informed us of a network outage affecting Lone Hill, affected clients will experience no connectivity. Vumatel engineers are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologise for any inconvenience caused.

open.title: Vumatel outage | Brackendowns
open.description: Vumatel has informed us of a network outage affecting Brackendowns, affected clients will experience no connectivity. Vumatel engineers are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologise for any inconvenience caused.

open.title: Vumatel Reach Outage | Grassy Park & Retreat Zone 4
open.description: Vumatel has informed us of a network outage affecting Vumatel Reach clients in Grassy Park & Retreat Zone 4, affected clients will experience no connectivity. Vumatel engineers are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologise for any inconvenience caused.

updates.content: We are investigating further impact in the following areas Greenfield ,  Weltevreden Valley & Woodlands
